sense.def:
To quote someone or something
pomeni, da natančno ponovimo, kar je neka oseba napisala ali rekla.

seg.quote: He was quoted in the paper as saying: ‘This strike is evil.’
She quoted the Chinese proverb about candles.

sense.def:
To quote something
pomeni omeniti nekaj, na primer zakon ali dejstvo, zato, ker potrjuje naše besede.

seg.quote: They quote figures to compare the costs of adult education in different countries.

sense.def:
A quote from a book, poem, or play
je stavek ali besedna zveza iz neke knjige, pesmi ali igre.

A quote for a piece of work
je znesek, za katerega nekdo pravi, da ga bo zaračunal, da bi opravil neko delo.

seg.quote: Get a quote from a caterer for a big party.

sense.def:
Quotes
je druga beseda za
quotation marks
;
